## Collecting all the scripts in one

```{r}
rm(list=ls())
library(quarto)
#source("01_load.qmd")
#source("02_cleam.qmd")
#source("03_augment.qmd")
#source("04_describe.qmd")
#source("05_analysis_1.qmd")
#source("05_analysis_2.qmd")
#source("05_analysis_3.qmd")
```

```{r}
# Define the input file and dynamic output directory
input_file <- here("R/01_load.qmd")
output_dir <- here("results")

# Ensure the output directory exists
dir.create(output_dir, recursive = TRUE, showWarnings = FALSE)

# Render the Quarto document
quarto_render(
  input = input_file,
  execute_params = list(output_dir = output_dir)
)
```
